definition: the Indian subcontinent (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)
day/sky/heaven
surname Zhu/abbr. for 天竺[Tian1 zhu2] India (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)/Buddhism (archaic)
variant of 篤|笃[du3]
geranium (Pelargonium hortorum)
guinea pig/cavy
dahlia

sentences.english: I went out to water the geraniums.
How could a guinea pig cost that much to maintain?
sentences.chinese: 養一隻小小的天竺鼠的花費怎麼可能這麼高呢？

sentences.english: The lemon geranium sloughs dry brown leaves at the base of its branches.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬天竺葵枝條底部棕色的枯葉會脫落。

sentences.english: The garden was gay with red geraniums.
sentences.chinese: 花園裏紅色的天竺葵花色彩豔麗。

sentences.english: 2 compound, Geranium oil, three times daily with skin lesions.
sentences.chinese: 複方香葉天竺葵油，每日塗皮損處三次。

sentences.english: Grains of pollen on a geranium stigma .
sentences.chinese: 天竺葵柱頭上的花粉顆粒。

sentences.english: A guinea pig will cost just $2, 905 over its lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 一隻天竺鼠一生大概只要花2095美元。

sentences.english: I love fish pelargonium, excel other any flowers, especially gules .
sentences.chinese: 我愛天竺葵，勝於其他任何花，尤其是紅色的。

sentences.english: The below map shows the route Xuanzang went to India.
sentences.chinese: 下面的地圖顯示當年唐三藏到天竺取經的路線。

sentences.english: A girl of about my age was standing beside a pot of geraniums.
sentences.chinese: 在一罐天竺葵旁，站着一個與我年齡相仿的女孩。

sentences.english: But with just a five-year life expectancy, a guinea pig won’t eat into that college fund.
sentences.chinese: 但是天竺鼠的壽命只有5年，因此它是不會喫窮你的。

sentences.english: The fragrance of perfume geranium suits a kitchen very much, can stomachic .
sentences.chinese: 香水天竺葵的香味很適合廚房，能增進食慾。

sentences.english: What makes you think they're gonna take better care of geraniums?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得他們能照顧好天竺葵花嗎？

sentences.english: Lemongrass, orange and geranium, a perfect combination to relax your body.
sentences.chinese: 香茅，鮮橙和天竺葵的完美融合，放鬆身心。

sentences.english: What do you do to your geraniums to keep them blooming in the winter, Mary?
sentences.chinese: 你會怎麼做你的天竺葵，讓他們在冬季開花，瑪麗？

sentences.english: Today, I found out that my beloved guinea pig has impaction.
sentences.chinese: 今天我發現心愛的天竺鼠得了腸阻塞。

definition: Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
the East/China
Sino-Turkish
Parthia
ancient Central Asian city state, flourished in first millennium AD, in modern Aksu 阿克蘇地區|阿克苏地区, Xinjiang
Tubo or Tufan, old name for Tibet/the Tibetan Tubo dynasty 7th-11th century AD/also pr. [Tu3 fan1]
Xuanzang (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645
(old) foreign land/alien nation
Khmer kingdom of Kampuchea or Cambodia/Chinese term for Cambodia from 7th to 15th century
old name for the Pamir high plateau 帕米爾高原|帕米尔高原[Pa4 mi3 er3 Gao1 yuan2] on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Persia
Huihu, Tang dynasty name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]
the Tang dynasty (618-907)
Great Tang Records on the Western Regions, travel record of Xuan Zang 玄奘[Xuan2 zang4], compiled by 辯機|辩机[Bian4 ji1] in 646
the Greater Yuezhi, a branch of the Yuezhi 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] people of central Asia during the Han dynasty
Tuyuhun, a Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people/a state in Qinhai in 4th-7th century AD
